#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.date,count(*) total from (select DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,"%Y%m%d") date,t.id from baoxian_underwriting_request r LEFT JOIN baoxian_intent t on r.baoxian_intent_id=t.id where r.user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
r.city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
t.create_time> #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}> t.create_time
and r.status in (99,100)
GROUP BY date,t.user_id,t.user_type
GROUP BY t.id )a GROUP BY date
